secure_radius.description: Radius around this objective marker which needs to be clear of areas to complete SecureArea objective stage

secure_rate.description: The rate of progress per second while securing the area. The area is considered secure when progress reaches 1.0

lost_rate.description: The rate of regress per second while the area is abandoned. The area is considered secure when progress reaches 1.0

animation_variable.description: [string]Name of the animation variable to control with the progress value

animation_value_min.description: The minimum value for the range set to the animation variable

animation_value_max.description: The maximum value for the range set to the animation variable

encounter_start_percent.description: At which point at the securing progress do we trigger an encounter?

move_amount.description: How far to move train (temp test)?
